metadata.title: CVE-2024-1675 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Insufficient policy enforcement in Download in Google Chrome prior to122.0.6261.57 allowed a remote attacker to bypass filesystem restrictionsvia a crafted HTML page. (Chromium security severity: Medium)

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
